LANDING_COPY.value:
Unlock secret messages.
Become a Master Code Breaker.

TUTORIAL_1.value: Rotate the inner wheel to align the letter "A" to the decoder window.

TUTORIAL_2.value: Now rotate the outer wheel to align the letter "K" to the decoder window.

TUTORIAL_3.value: Now that you have the cipher key, press the lock so that the two wheels can move together.

TUTORIAL_4.value: The first hint in the code above is the letter "J" on the bottom row. Align the wheel so the bottom letter "J" is in the decoder window.

TUTORIAL_5.value: The first letter in the secret message aligns with the "J." Press the "T" to enter it.

TUTORIAL_6.value:
Next, press the letter that aligns with the "U" 
in the wheel.

TUTORIAL_7.value: Now the letter that aligns with "Q."

TUTORIAL_LEVEL_1_COMPLETE_COPY.value:
You've cracked the code!
Want to try another one?

TUTORIAL_10_COPY.value: Remember to rotate the wheels so that the top and bottom letters align to match the top and bottom letters in the code above. Then lock the wheel to use the cipher key.

TUTORIAL_COMPLETE_COPY.value: You've completed the training mission! Decipher more codes to become a Master Code Breaker.

INCORRECT_CIPHER_ALERT_COPY.value: Looks like you've matched the wrong letters on your cipher.

CORRECT_CIPHER_ALERT_COPY.value:
You've cracked the code!
Want to try another one?

EXPERT_LEVEL_1_START_COPY.value:
Ready for your first mission?
Two letters in the code are already aligned for you. Match the top and bottom letters in the wheel to
match the top and bottom
letters in the code.

EXPERT_LEVEL_1_START_HINT.value: HINT: Don't forget to lock the wheel!

EXPERT_LEVEL_1_COMPLETE_COPY.value: Nice work! You're on your way to becoming a Master Code Breaker.

EXPERT_LEVEL_2_START_COPY.value:
Some of these codes have two words. And this time only one
of the letters in the code is
aligned for you.

EXPERT_LEVEL_2_START_HINT.value: HINT: Use the letters that repeat as clues.

EXPERT_LEVEL_2_COMPLETE_COPY.value: Great job! You made that look easy. You're ready for some tougher codes.

EXPERT_LEVEL_3_START_COPY.value: Now you're on your own, with no clues. See if you can decipher these words that are connected to the book series Explorer Academy.

EXPERT_LEVEL_3_START_HINT.value: HINT: Correct letters will stay up even if the code is wrong. Think about common letters to try.

EXPERT_LEVEL_3_COMPLETE_COPY.value: Great code breaking back there. You're on a roll!

EXPERT_LEVEL_4_START_COPY.value: To be an Expert Code Breaker, decipher these complex words and phrases. Some of these answers might be ideas or places from the book "Explorer Academy: The Nebula Secret."

EXPERT_LEVEL_4_COMPLETE_COPY.value: You're totally an expert. Keep up the great work!

EXPERT_LEVEL_5_START_COPY.value: These last codes are tough. Some of these answers might be characters, places, or technology from the book "Explorer Academy: The Nebula Secret."

EXPERT_LEVEL_5_COMPLETE_COPY.value: Amazing! You can crack anything! You're a Master Code Breaker. No cipher is too tough for you.

EXPERT_START_GAME_COMPLETE_COPY.value: You've completed this mission, but many more codes await you. Play again to solve new ciphers.
